name: The Fire (piotr-krzystanek, Jadw1)
description:
Cold is comming. The fire is the only solution. You have to find the way out! But something weird is happening…

INSTRUCTIONS:
W, A, S, D to move
E to pick item/interact
Space to skip turn

Some blocks can be removed by walking into them twice. Some of them also require necessary tool.

Source: https://github.com/Jadw1/LudumDare46V2
